text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews This guy is an absolute failure in addressing the coronavirus crisis! 
He does nothing, taking no responsibility for anything!
His narcissistic, selfish approach is destroying all that’s good and strong in this democracy!
America doesn’t deserve this dangerously toxic loser!
